tool.name: MapStatistics
tool.description: Extract extended statistics on the features of a map for quality control.
tool.command:
MapStatistics
#if $param_in: -in $param_in #end if #if $param_out: -out $param_out #end if #if $param_n: -n $param_n #end if #if $param_m: -m #if " " in str($param_m): "$param_m" #else $param_m #end if #end if #if $param_p: -p #if " " in str($param_p): "$param_p" #else $param_p #end if #end if #if $param_s: -s #if " " in str($param_s): "$param_s" #else $param_s #end if #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #if " " in str($adv_opts.param_force): "$adv_opts.param_force" #else $adv_opts.param_force #end if #end if #end if

param.name: param_n
param.label: Report separate statistics for each of n RT slices of the map

param.name: param_m
param.label: Show meta information about the whole experiment

param.name: param_s
param.label: Computes a summary statistics of intensities, qualities, and widths

tool.help:
Extract extended statistics on the features of a map for quality control.
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/TOPP_MapStatistics.html
